name: memoize
signature: <RIn, E, ROut>(self: Layer<ROut, E, RIn>) => Effect<Layer<ROut, E, RIn>, never, Scope>
description:
Returns a scoped effect that, if evaluated, will return the lazily computed
result of this layer.
documentation:
Returns a scoped effect that, if evaluated, will return the lazily computed
result of this layer.
